body: Hi guys! I've had an optifine cape for a while now, and now my cape isnt showing up. I can see other peoples capes, but not my own. Also other people cannot see my cape. And yes, I do have show capes set to on. Could someone help me figure out this problem?
body_tagged: Hi guys! I've had an optifine cape for a while now, and now my cape isnt showing up. I can see other peoples capes, but not my own. Also other people cannot see my cape. And yes, I do have show capes set to on. Could someone help me figure out this problem?
title: Help me?

replies.body: Did you go to the official optifine site and like set it up and stuff? I've not really tried using a cape before
replies.body_tagged: Did you go to the official optifine site and like set it up and stuff? I've not really tried using a cape before

replies.body:
Reinstall optifine

also theres two options of see capes, one in optifine and video settings and one in multiplayer settings, make sure both of them are on.

go to the official optifine site and login w/ your donation email and password, try to see if your cape is set on your username

anyways ive seen shitton of optifine glitches where you cant see capes in the past few weeks so that might be temp idk

go to the official optifine site and login w/ your donation email and password, try to see if your cape is set on your username

anyways ive seen shitton of optifine glitches where you cant see capes in the past few weeks so that might be temp idk

replies.body: Go on optifine.net/login > Login > and then you can activate your cape i think
